name: Punk City
description:
Punk City, as the name suggests, is a side-scrolling shooter set in a time when the streets are run by cybotic robots. You play as Kay, Who has time traveled into the future 2077 to control the robots and rule the world. Kay must be careful as the futuristic weapons would pretty much kill him instantly. Can your play help Kay to play over the world?

Controls -

Movement - A/D

Jump - Spacebar

Shoot - Left click

Recommended - Full Screen

Credits - 

Assets - https://ansimuz.itch.io/
